original: Sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṁ tattha sāmīci.
analyzed: sā ca bhikkhunī an abbhitā tāḥ ca bhikkhuniyaḥ gārayhāḥ ayam tattha sāmīci
pucchāmi
kaccit tha parisuddhā

tatiyam pi pucchāmi
kaccit tha parisuddhā
